title: Cannot synch a .java file and another resource
OB: When trying to sync a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully update both the .java file and the other resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce:1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
